程序包 org.openjdk.tools.javac.main

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Arguments
    Shared option and argument handling for command line and API usage of javac.
    CommandLine
    Various utility methods for processing Java tool command line arguments.
    CommandLine.Tokenizer  
    JavaCompiler
    This class could be the main entry point for GJC when GJC is used as a component in a larger software system.
    JavacToolProvider
    An implementation of the ToolProvider SPI, providing access to JDK Java compiler, javac.
    Main
    This class provides a command line interface to the javac compiler.
    OptionHelper
    Helper object to be used by Option.process(org.openjdk.tools.javac.main.OptionHelper, java.lang.String), providing access to the compilation environment.
    OptionHelper.GrumpyHelper
    An implementation of OptionHelper that mostly throws exceptions.
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    JavaCompiler.CompilePolicy
    Control how the compiler's latter phases (attr, flow, desugar, generate) are connected.
    JavaCompiler.ImplicitSourcePolicy  
    Main.Result
    Result codes.
    Option
    Options for javac.
    Option.ArgKind
    The kind of argument, if any, accepted by this option.
    Option.OptionKind
    The kind of an Option.
    Option.PkgInfo  
  • 异常错误概要 
    异常错误 说明
    CommandLine.UnmatchedQuote  
    Option.InvalidValueException
    This exception is thrown when an invalid value is given for an option.
